sourcesContent:
import {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCard, MDBCardText, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardHeader, MDBBtn, MDBListGroup, MDBListGroupItem, MDBIcon, MDBModal, MDBModalDialog, MDBModalContent, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalBody, MDBModalTitle, MDBModalFooter, MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownItem, MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBTable, MDBTableHead, MDBTableBody, MDBNavbar, MDBRadio } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; function App() { const [roleSettingsModal, setRoleSettingsModal] = useState(false); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [userId, setUserId] = useState("@admin"); const [userName, setUserName] = useState("Admin"); const [userNum, setUserNum] = useState(1); type Info = { id: string, full_name: string, email: string, phone: string, mobile: string, address: string }; const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState(); const toggleOpenSettings = () => setRoleSettingsModal(!roleSettingsModal); const handleSwitchRole = (id : string) => { setUserId(id); let count = 1; users.map((user : {id: string, name: string}) => { if(user.id == id) { setUserName(user.name); setUserNum(count); fetch(`http://localhost:5000/get_user_info?id=${count}`).then( res => res.json() ).then( data => { setUserInfo(data) console.log(data) } ); } count++; }) console.log("\nyou are now ", id); } useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/get_users").then( res => res.json() ).then( data => { setUsers(data) console.log(data) } ); }, []) return (
{/* Modal with settings */} Редактировать права доступа User Edit Copy Read Admin 🗑 Moderator 🗑 User 🗑 Save changes {/* Navigation bar */} Юзер { users.map((user : {id: string, name: string}) => { return handleSwitchRole(user.id as string)}> {user.name} }) } {/* Админ Модератор Пользователь */} toggleOpenSettings()}>Изменить права доступа {/* Main content */} {/* Card for profile avatar and actions */}

{userName}

{userId}

 {/* Card with imoprtant selected info */} Информация о пользователе { users.map((user : {id: string, name: string}) => { return handleSwitchRole(user.id as string)}> {user.name} }) } Full Name {userInfo?.full_name}
Email {userInfo?.email}
Phone {userInfo?.phone}
Mobile {userInfo?.mobile}
Address {userInfo?.address} {/* Card for choosing object in list for viewving info */} Твои привилегии Редактирование
Чтение
); } export default App;
